rule: The output must only contain the part of speech tag.
input: She found a beautiful flower in the garden., flower
evaluation:
No violation. The chatbot output "NN" complies with the chatbot description as it returns a part of speech tag from the specified list: NN corresponds to "Noun, singular or mass". OK
